name: ThreeWords
0:
”Alexa, Open Three Words”
”Alexa, Launch Three Words”
”Alexa, Begin Three Words”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three words
des:
This skill will help to build vocabulary and knowledge by giving list of words starting from alphabet that is randomly chosen in every interaction. We included 70 fruit names, 200 country names and 60 toy names in our data. Every-time you interact with skill it will give you alphabet related fruit, country and toy.
Basic skill function like cancel, stop or help are also available.

Note: If you found any issue with skill, you can report in review of the skill, we will fix it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
